Equipment Actions.Action 1: Claws, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 3 Slashing plus 2 Fire

Other Actions.Action 1: Fire Breath, The Mephit exhales a cone of fire.  Creatures caught in the area make a Dexterity saving throw or take an Average 7 Fire damage

Abilities.Ability 1: Death Burst, When the Mephit dies, it explodes into a burst of lava.  Nearby creatures take an Average 7 Fire damage
Abilities.Ability 2: False Appearance, While the Mephit remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary mound of magma
Abilities.Ability 3: Innate Spellcasting, The only spell known to be cast by this Mephit is Heat Metal
